name: that one ghost on the tabletop
name_original: that one ghost on the tabletop
description:
A small game about capturing a rogue ghost made in 5 hours. It's hard. Please tweet me if you manage to beat it!

Controls

  • The mouse is the collision point.
  • Trance mode is slowing down time.
  • Basically, draw circles around the enemy with salt (Pokemon Rangers style)
